content:
There is marketing issues to track. One is twitter/X: https://twitter.com/opencpn which needs an update. Perhaps we should just say "this account is not updated".

Twitter/X is basically a troll farm, I'm just there to follow the Ukraine war. If it wasn't for this I'd let it go despite a multitude of funny dogs, cats and sexbots.
A message was moved here from #OCPN 5.10 Release plan > stream events by Alec Leamas.

Dan Dickey said:

Do we know who "owns" this account?

Looks like someone from Japan...
OTOH there is also OpenCPN_org. nicely updated: https://twitter.com/OpenCPN_org
